overview: Beaver and Buttface are not role models, as a matter of fact they are not even human. They are twisted sex crazed perverts with warped minds, stiff little wieners, bad breath and the morals of Freddy Krueger with blue balls. This is their story: It is the first day of school and the boys are knee deep into a rectal research project... until they meet Cleavage and Bunghole, a pair of tested sorority sisters that show the boys the true meaning of search for life on Ur-Anus!
title: Beaver and Buttface
